meta.name: description
meta.content: San Augustine Independent School District is a public school district in San Augustine, Texas that includes San Augustine Elementary, San Augustine Intermediate, and San Augustine High. This district serves grades K-12.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: san augustine isd, san augustine schools

div.p: Mr. Schmieder's Computer Science class pose with the computers they built recently. The students worked in teams of two on the project and their computers are on now on display (along with a poster displaying the internal motherboard and components) in the HS Library! Awesome job guys!

img.alt: Host of Wolves in winter image

div.p: Our Vision - Building a community of excellence by nurturing talents, inspiring learners, and developing leaders for an ever-changing world.

div.div: Welcome to SAISD!! I am looking forward to a great 2019-20 school year. My primary responsibility as Superintendent is to create, nurture, and maintain a learning and leadership environment for the school district.
Bienvenidos! Bienvenue! Willkommen! Fáilte! Welcome to SAISD and the HOME OF THE WOLVES!

article.aria-label: Boys Basketball Members Earn 22-2A All-District Honors

h3.a: Boys Basketball Members Earn 22-2A All-District Honors

div.div: Congratulations to Tank Malone, Reco Burrell, TiJay Thomas Davis, Jeremiah Watts, and Jayden Hicks for earning spots in the 22-2A All-District Teams! Thank you for your hard work and diligence throughout the season!

Please click on the "Read Full Story" or the headline to read the announcement from Superintendent Dr. Liepman on how this affects our students, their virtual learning and particularly graduating Seniors.

article.aria-label: Stay at Home Order in Effect for our Community - WOW on Hold

h3.a: Stay at Home Order in Effect for our Community - WOW on Hold

img.alt: People in front of a house holding hands

div.div: Wolves on Wheels program is on hold due to the Stay at Hold Order for our county. The HS cafeteria remains open from 8-noon for Grab& Go and meals. Please click "Read Full Story" or the headline to read the Stay at Home Order for San Augustine County.

article.aria-label: Superintendent Dr. Liepman SAISD Community Letter

h3.a: Superintendent Dr. Liepman SAISD Community Letter

div.div: Dear San Augustine ISD Employees & Families, We appreciate your patience and support during this unprecedented time. The health and well-being of all in our district and community continues to be our number one priority. (click the headline to read the entire letter)

article.aria-label: May School Board Meeting moved to May 14th @ 6 pm

h3.a: May School Board Meeting moved to May 14th @ 6 pm

div.div: The School Board May meeting has changed to May 14th at 6:00 p.m. (the meeting was originally scheduled for May 21st).

img.alt: Meeting Canceled spelled out in Red Letters

div.div: There will be no school board meeting (it was scheduled for April 23rd). The meeting is canceled.

article.aria-label: SAHS FFA Grab-and-Go Plant Sale! April 28,29,30 from 12-3 pm.

h3.a: SAHS FFA Grab-and-Go Plant Sale! April 28,29,30 from 12-3 pm.

div.div: Come out and support the FFA Grab-n-Go Plant sale! For important information please click the headline to see plants, prices. location and how you can order yours today!

article.aria-label: No Middle School Packet Pickup on Monday!

h3.a: No Middle School Packet Pickup on Monday!

img.alt: Pencil and Paper with words Homework

div.div: There will be no packet pick up on Monday, packets were mailed out today. Students will keep completed packet and all packets will be collected at a later date.

article.aria-label: School Closures' Date Extended by Govenor Abbott

h3.a: School Closures' Date Extended by Govenor Abbott

div.div: IMPORTANT! Texas Schools' Closure Date Extended by Governor Abbott. Please click on the headline to read Dr. Liepman's letter to our community regarding this new development!
